title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews

items.title: Federal judge orders release of 16 migrants detained in Idaho raid, citing due process violations
items.description: A federal judge has ordered the release of 16 people detained by immigration officials during an FBI-led raid at a rural Idaho racetrack last month

items.title: Trump's wind-down of the Education Department leaves schools fearing disruption
items.description: The Trump administration is steaming forward on its plan to dismantle the Education Department
